com.ibm.aglets
Class SubscriberManager

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.aglets.SubscriberManager

final class SubscriberManager
extends java.lang.Object

The SubscriberManager class defines a subscribe machanism for communication among aglets in the same aglet context. Upon any change to the property, all the subscribed aglets are notified.

Version:
1.10 96/11/28
Author:
Yariv Aridor, Mitsuru Oshima
